content.html: If I had a nickel for every great 2020 game where you have a gun that's more an idea than a gun and you're fighting interdimensional enemies while collecting floppy disks in a dreamlike world, I'd have 10 cents. Which isn't a lot but it's still weird it happened twice.
content.value:
If I had a nickel for every great 2020 game where you have a gun that's more an idea than a gun and you're fighting interdimensional enemies while collecting floppy disks in a dreamlike world, I'd have 10 cents.

Which isn't a lot but it's still weird it happened twice.
